verses.verse: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: The gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> working <S%H4639><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; but on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day it shall be opened <S%H6605><s%>, and on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be opened <S%H6605><s%>.

And the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by the post <S%H4201><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>; and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and he shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>: then he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>; but the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> until the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> on the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> and on the new moons <S%H2320><s%>.

And the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> that the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H4991><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be a young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, and six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>, and a ram <S%H352><s%>; they shall be without blemish <S%H8549><s%>:

and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> according as he <S%H3027><s%> is able <S%H5381><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And when the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%>, he shall go <S%H935><s%> in by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way thereof <S%H1870><s%>.

But when the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%>, he that entereth <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>; and he that entereth <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: he shall not return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> whereby he came in <S%H935><s%>, but shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> straight before him <S%H5226><s%>.

And the prince <S%H5387><s%>, when they go in <S%H935><s%>, shall go in <S%H935><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them <S%H3318><s%>; and when they go forth, they shall go forth together <S%H3318><s%>.

And in the feasts <S%H2282><s%> and in the solemnities <S%H4150><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H4991><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And when the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a <S%H5071><s%> freewill-offering <S%H5930><s%>, a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> or peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> as a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, one shall open <S%H6605><s%> for him the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%>; and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, as he doth on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: then he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>; and after <S%H310><s%> his going forth <S%H3318><s%> one shall shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%>: morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning <S%H1242><s%> shalt thou prepare it <S%H6213><s%>.

And thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> with it morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning <S%H1242><s%>, the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%>, and the third part <S%H7992><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, to moisten the fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%>.

Thus shall they prepare <S%H6213><s%> the lamb <S%H3532><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the oil <S%H8081><s%>, morning by morning <S%H1242><s%>, for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: If the prince <S%H5387><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> unto any <S%H376><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, it is his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, it shall belong to his sons <S%H1121><s%>; it is their possession <S%H272><s%> by inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

But if he give <S%H5414><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, it shall be his to the year <S%H8141><s%> of liberty <S%H1865><s%>; then it shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the prince <S%H5387><s%>; but as for his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, it shall be for his sons <S%H1121><s%>.

Moreover the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>'s inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, to <S%H3238><s%> thrust <S%H3238><s%> them out of their possession <S%H272><s%>; he shall give inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to his sons <S%H1121><s%> out of his own possession <S%H272><s%>, that my people <S%H5971><s%> be not scattered <S%H6327><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his possession <S%H272><s%>.

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me through the entry <S%H3996><s%>, which was at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, into the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%>, which looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>: and <S%H4725><s%>, behold, there was a place on the hinder part <S%H3411><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H4725><s%>, This is the place where the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the trespass-offering <S%H2403><s%> and the sin-offering <S%H817><s%>, and where they shall bake <S%H644><s%> the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%>; that they bring <S%H3318><s%> them not forth into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

Then he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, and caused me to pass by <S%H5674><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>; and <S%H4740><s%>, behold, in every corner <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there was a court <S%H2691><s%>.

In the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there were courts <S%H2691><s%> inclosed <S%H7000><s%>, forty <S%H705><s%> cubits long <S%H753><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>: these four <S%H702><s%> in the corners <S%H7106><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

And there was a wall <S%H2905><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> in them <S%H5439><s%>, round about the four <S%H702><s%>, and boiling-places <S%H4018><s%> were made <S%H6213><s%> under the walls <S%H2918><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1310><s%>, These are the boiling - houses <S%H1004><s%>, where the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
